attributes.action: Provide Students with more incentives to keep them at university, More funding housing etc!!!!!!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to request that the government help us THE FUTURE in more ways by offering more incentives at university and more help with fees etc. More affordale cost of living so that we do not have to suffer and live in a state of stress and anxiety for three or more years. Remeber were supposed to be training for the future
